alert.note: Alert for Collin; Denton; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 2:00PM CDT until May 19 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Denton County in north central Texas... Northwestern Collin County in north central Texas... South central Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Celina, or 12 miles north of Frisco, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McKinney, Anna, Celina, Melissa, Van Alstyne, Howe, Gunter, Weston and Elmont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
